name: Tom Harding
text: I love this place. They have a good variety to choose from. And my favorites are anything with mushrooms and this custard like thing that's wrapped in a thin sheet of pastry dough. Anyone who likes Chinese food should definitely check this place out.

name: Farhan Ali
text:
I ordered from this place lobster roll, avocado roll , avocado salad. As soon as the food came in. It was cold. The sushi was stale and the salad was a joke just having avocado and lettuce.
Please ! please ! please ! Ignore the 3-4 star rating. Look at the 1 star ratings. They all say the same thing.
I called the staff to complain about the food. They didn’t apologize. Infact they were adamant that food was fresh and made recently.
Never ordering from them
Again.

name: ZackTheProgrammer
text: The food. Is. Amazing. Usually when you go to a buffet you have to hunt for the good food and steer clear of the rest. Not the case here. Everything I tried was perfect. 5/5 stars.

name: Tyler Yates
text: Went in today and was handed my silverware and told pick my own seat. This wasn’t a problem. However the host and all employees had no masks on. No gloves for the buffet either. The table seemed to be dirty and was sticky from sweet and sour sauce. The bathroom seemed clean but everything was sticky as well. It seemed the establishment had no intentions of keeping the facility sanitized. They only refilled my drink once and skipped my table twice for refills. My food plates was never taken. Highly recommended not going here.

name: Michael R Ballard
text: Was very good...must go when busy...as the food comes out fresh more often

name: Jessie YOUNG
text: Usually LOVE this eatery, but some of the food wasn't as good this trip. The fried fish batter was very salty so I could not eat more than one bite. The meat was tough in what my husband got so he could not eat his. The kimchi wasn't quite as good, either. The other food we sampled was delicious.

name: Jami Housman
text: There is room for improvement, faster, friendlier waitstaff, could be cleaner, and needs to put out more chopsticks!

name: Hing Man
text: The food is so delicious and their service is very good! I will certainly come back again and willingly recommend to anyone.

name: Ernesto Ramos III
text: That buffet was outstanding at a high level me and the cook had a conversation who was frying my food on the grill it was awesome

name: Tory Bryant
text: I never spit out food in a napkin, but three times in a row on the same visit is enough for me to get out of there quickly. Time it wisely or not at all, gotta ask for a menu for hibachi entrees which they failed to mention.

name: michael holden
text: The quality has gone way down since my last visit.  The mushrooms was not washed before being cooked and therefore tasted like dirt and had pieces of grit in them.  Several dishes tasted like gamey fish even though they didn't contain fish, im guessing it came from not changing out the frier grease. Very sub-par.

name: Danielle Price
text: Its ok. Not the best food I've ever had and the woman that works there is not very friendly. Don't know if ill go back or not.

name: Angela Davis
text: Love love love this place , great food great staff!!

name: Bozoolie Montalto
text: I'll give them three stars for the buffet but five stars surprisingly for their takeout. Their takeout is really traditional Chinese and very very good

resp.text: Thank you for your support to our shop, your praise is the biggest encouragement to me, we will work harder to provide you with better service, wish you a pleasant dinner

name: Amber Wilbourn
text: Food was awful noodles was dry some even had a crunch 🤦🏻‍♀️ Pudding(not chocolate one) tasted rotten!! The lemons was turning brown.  Waitress was rude! No mask what so ever and then seated a whole family of like 6 right next to us giving us barley any room to navigate much less being able to maintain a 6 foot distance. Was told kids 3yrs and younger ate free then we got our ticket she charged us for him even though they stated he was free.. she got an attitude about it. Worse experience worse food and I’m not picky it takes a lot to me me complain about food lol

name: Ernesto Ramos
text: The presentation was very very likely an enlightening experience

name: Rafa Cruz
text: Friendly, Clean, Good service and good food

name: Denise Funches
text: Hot food good food decent price

name: Gregory Bedsworth
text: None of the employees had  masks on, there was no space between me and next customer( no social distancing). Employee with no mask was sweeping the carpet right next to our table, and when I asked the owner if they had to wear masks she showed me her mask sitting on the counter and said yes I wear it all day but she didn't have it on. I will never go back.

name: Brenda Johnson
text: Very nice owners and staff. Food is delicious.

name: brandon brown
text: Lady was extremely rude food is terrible and under cooked wouldn't recommend it

resp.text: We have seen your feedback, and please understand the inconvenience caused to you.We also thank you very much for your understanding and support to us, wish you a happy life！

name: Stephanie Tipper
text: My aunt ordered food to go and it was so hot it melted the styrofoam container from top to bottom and created huge mess. Thank God no one got seriously burned. The food went straight into the trash because of the melted styrofoam chemicals in the food.

name: Mary Robertson
text: Service is good! The price is right for a buffet and the grill in the back for made to order is a bonus! But the food to me doesn't taste as good as it use too.

name: Danielle Pollock
text: Horrible waste of 25.00 I have ever spent  My son and I really wanted Chinese and thought we would give it a try. Food was cold and inedible. Had to eat elsewhere and spend more money for food. Would give zero stars if possible.

name: Jesyka Davis (Jess)
text: The food was good and the staff are always friendly but the only thing that happens every time I go is they sweep right beside you. Sweeping and eating just dont mix.. It stirs the dirt up over my food.. I lose my appetite. I wish they could work on this.

name: Susan Hamm
text: We love Mongolian grill. The food is delicious and the staff are friendly and kind. I do wish they had a ice cream machine like other places do with cones.

name: Xacier
text: Never in my life have I ever eaten such cold food. The taste was good but the fact that it wasn’t even warm just ruined it for me. Staff were unapologetic and blamed the foods temperature on the weather. I felt as if the quality was worse than Chuck E. Cheese. Don’t recommend unless you wanna feel like you’re chewing on a tire.

name: Jeremy Woods
text: Excellent hot wings. Best mac-n-cheese in town. Bbq ribs are usually really good too. And it's a full Chinese buffet.

name: Todd Holtkamp
text: Great variety

name: Daniel Ray
text: It's a good place.  It's all you can eat buffet so you know it isnt gourmet food when you go in.  Still, its friendly enough and clean and the food is plentiful.

name: Amanda Moore
text: Good service, nice selection of buffet items. Clean restrooms.

name: Rickey Streetman
text: Excellent food and service

resp.text: Thank you for your support to our shop, your praise is the biggest encouragement to me, we will work harder to provide you with better service, wish you a pleasant dinner

name: Jonathan White
text: Amazing staff and food!! Great take out service and prices!!! Love this place !!

name: Pamela Smith
text: Good food

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Hi Pamela,A very good customer, thank you for your patronage, welcome to come again! Thank you for every evaluation, we will try to do better!
Hope you have a good mood every day, I wish you a happy life!
Very good customer, thank you for your patronage, welcome to come again next time! Thank you for every evaluation, Xiaodian will work hard to do better!
I hope you have a good mood every day and wish you a happy life!

(Original)
Hi Pamela,A very good customer, thank you for your patronage, welcome to come again! Thank you for every evaluation, we will try to do better!
Hope you have a good mood every day, I wish you a happy life!
很好的顾客，谢谢您的光顾，欢迎下次再来！感谢您的每一次评价，小店会努力做的更好！
希望您每天都有一个好心情，祝您生活愉快！

name: kathryn wisdom
text: Very disappointed with the food and service.

name: Robert Pastuszka
text: Good food at a reasonable price.

name: Robin Dean
text: Love it

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Hi Robin, thank you for your patronage, welcome to come again! Thank you for every evaluation, we will try to do better!
Hope you have a good mood every day, I wish you a happy life!
Thank you for your patronage and welcome to come again next time! Thank you for every evaluation, Xiaodian will work hard to do better!
I hope you have a good mood every day and wish you a happy life!

Hope you have a good mood every day, I wish you a happy life!

希望您每天都有一个好心情，祝您生活愉快！

name: Steve Alewine
text: Food is great and very friendly service

name: Anna Owens
text: Less then a star, cold food, horrible service, argumentative staff, old food. Not much selection and no compromise for bad food.

name: Dawn Buttrum
text: Wasn't there 🙄

name: Patrick S
text: Cold food, staff not the nicest.

name: Nina Coats
text: Great food

name: Dorothy Skipworth Gargis
text: Variety of dishes.
